# PluralCategory type

One of the valid [Unicode CLDR](http://cldr.unicode.org/index/cldr-spec/plural-rules) plural category keys

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PluralCategory = 'zero' | 'one' | 'two' | 'few' | 'many' | 'other';
```
